title: Minimum Number of Days to Make m Bouquets
content: Given an integer array , an integer and an integer . We need to make bouquets. To make a bouquet, you need to use adjacent flowers from the garden. The garden consists of flowers, the flower will bloom in the and then can be used in exactly one bouquet. Return the minimum number of days you need to wait to be able to make bouquets from the garden. If it is impossible to make bouquets return -1.
